subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, his game showing weeks of rust, lost his opening match of the clay-court season — a 2-6, 6-1, 7-5 defeat at the Rome Masters to the world’s 40th-ranked player, Ernests Gulbis of Latvia.
snippet: Roger Federer, his game showing weeks of rust, lost his opening match of the clay-court season — a 2-6, 6-1, 7-5 defeat at the Rome Masters to the world’s 40th-ranked player, Ernests Gulbis of Latvia.
